name: Combobox
description: An example of a combobox component that allows users to select an option from a dropdown or enter a custom value.

props.name: options
props.description: The options for the combobox dropdown.

props.name: selectedOption
props.description: The currently selected option of the combobox.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback function when the selected option changes.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text displayed when no option is selected.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the combobox will be disabled.
